snippet.title: SHADOWGUN: DEADZONE Launch Trailer (iOS/Android)
snippet.description:
Get ready! SHADOWGUN: DEADZONE is coming on November 15th on iOS and Android!

SHADOWGUN is back in multiplayer dimension! 

Enjoy console quality multiplayer game with awesome graphics on your phone and tablet. 

Prove your courage and challenge your friends. 

Experience heroic battles in two popular game modes -- Deathmatch and Zone Control. 
Choose from various maps and from ten playable characters. 

Many weapons such as Vega (Attack Rifle), Big Boy (Machine gun), Spate (Plasma Rifle), Mace (Shotgun), Osog (Sniper), Sh*tStorm (Rocket Launcher) will be at your disposal. 

Equip yourself with a great variety of items-- Sprint, Medi Kit, Ammo Kit, FlashBang, EMP Grenade, Frag Grenade, Sentry Gun or Mine.

To provide an improved gaming experience, MADFINGER Games has cooperated exclusively with companies such as UNITY, NVIDIA, Much Different and Ericsson.
